quotes.quote: Mind control is built on lies and manipulation of attachment needs.
That awkward moment at Physical Therapy when you've completely lost count of your reps.
You can find hope in despair. Dwell on positive thoughts.

Physical therapy has a high burnout rate. The long hours of intense one on one time is emotionally fatiguing. And while we universally love our patients, there's always one rotten apple in the bunch who just breaks you down.
All the material wealth cannot be substituted for the spiritual, physical, emotion and mental well-being.
A physical therapist does some unbelievable stretching with me.
